.class public auto ansi Paragraph extends System.Windows.Documents.Block

summary.span: 用于将内容分组到一个段落中的块级别流内容元素。

span.span: A block-level flow content element used to group content into a paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强制实施子内容的强内容模型。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 有关 内容模型的详细信息，请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview)。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview) for more information about the content model. 除纯文本之外， 元素可以承载其他 元素。In addition to plain text, a element can host other elements. 有效的子元素包括：Valid child elements include: - - - - - - - - - - 请参阅[流文档概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview)，了解有关此对象可包含的内容以及可以包含的内容的详细信息。See [Flow Document Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview) for more information on what this object can contain and what can contain it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此 `ShouldSerialize` 方法的原因是 属性没有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已更改为其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果要为 开发设计器或开发包含 的自己的控件，则通常会调用此方法。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ TextDecorations { System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ value); };
member this.TextDecorations : System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，它包含应用于此元素的文本修饰。

span.span: Gets or sets a that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 一个 集合，它包含应用于此元素的文本修饰。

span.span: A collection that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 值为 表示不应用任何文本修饰。

span.span: A value of means no text decorations will be applied.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是可以添加到文本的视觉对象装饰。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四种类型的文本修饰：下划线、基线、删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅[如何：创建文本修饰](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 以下示例演示如何设置 的 属性。The following example shows how to set the property of a . [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_paragraph_textdecxaml)] [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_paragraph_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_paragraph_textdec)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：具有默认删除线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "屏幕快照：具有默认删除线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下图显示了上**划线**、**基线**和**下划线**修饰的分别呈现方式。The following figures show how the **Overline**, **Baseline**, and **Underline** decorations render, respectively. ![屏幕截图：上划线 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "屏幕快照：上划线 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![屏幕快照：文本上的默认基线效果](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "屏幕快照：文本上的默认基线效果")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![屏幕快照：具有默认下划线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "屏幕快照：具有默认下划线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 的第一行的缩进距离。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how far to indent the first line of a .

value.span: 一个双精度值，该值指定段落第一行的缩进量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A double value specifying the amount to indent the first line of the paragraph, in device independent pixels.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 大于或等于0.0 但小于 值的字符串表示形式。A string representation of a value equal to or greater than 0.0 but smaller than . 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 前面所述的 `double` 值（`Auto`除外）后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px`、`in`、`cm`、`pt`。A `double` value as described above, (except `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、, |
